wikipedia_page.main:
Craig George McEwan (born 3 October 1977 in Glasgow) is a Scottish footballer and coach and current manager of St Cadoc's Y.C.
A right full-back, McEwan has played in the Scottish Football League First Division for Raith Rovers and Ayr United and is a former Scotland under-21 international.

response: Former Raith Rovers and Ayr United player Craig McEwan took charge of the team in January 2015. A player in Glens' losing 2014 Junior Cup final side, McEwan led the club to their first Super League Premier Division championship in 2016–17, before completing the double by defeating local rivals Auchinleck Talbot to win the Scottish Junior Cup for a second time in June 2017.
